item.title: Spanish Video Creator for How To Tutorial Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for video creators to produce step-by-step tutorials for software, apps, email marketing tools, and product breakdowns through engaging Spanish voice-over recordings of their computer or phone screens.


You will need to create videos similar to these examples:-

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nR4NKpFljeo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E3dajk5WjiM


Requirements-

-Native or Fluent Spanish speakers are preferred.
-Access to a good-quality microphone
-Each video should be 8+ minutes
-Ability to explain concepts clearly and concisely
-We will provide video topics, relevant information, examples, and similar videos.
-Occasionally, you will be required to conduct research to create the video.
-We require 1- 3 videos per day.
-If you have experience creating similar videos, please send us samples. (People with experience will be preferred.)


What's in it for you?
- $5 per video
- Payment per video. The more videos you create, the more you earn.
- Flexible work hours—you can record at your convenience.
- A long-term position offering stability and flexibility.


If it seems like you're the perfect fit, then you can submit your proposal, and be sure to put "INTRUSTED" as the first word on your proposal (this will tell me you actually read the whole job post).

We look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Screencasting Video, Education, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Screencasting Video, Education, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor from India for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I am seeking a video editor from India to collaborate on creating content for my new YouTube channel. The videos will need to include subtitles in Sanskrit/Hindi and their transliteration (pronunciation guide of the lyrics).

Requirements:
Native of India: Preferably with knowledge of Sanskrit and Hindi.
Experience in video editing: Ability to create attractive and high-quality videos.
Subtitling: Skill in adding subtitles in Sanskrit/Hindi and their transliteration.
English communication: Good communication in English is essential to ensure better understanding and efficiency in video creation.
Responsibilities:
Create and edit videos based on provided songs.
Add subtitles in Sanskrit / Hindi and their transliteration.
Ensure the delivery of high-quality videos.
Continuously collaborate on producing a significant amount of videos.
Budget Consideration:
I am looking for a cost-effective solution as this will be a large-scale production with a high volume of videos. Therefore, I seek a budget-friendly option that ensures good quality while maintaining affordability. Long-term collaboration is key to achieving this balance.

Additional Information:
Please provide examples of your work for both "easy" and "intermediate" levels of video editing. Additionally, I would like to receive separate budget for both levels to consider which option would work best for me.

If you meet the requirements and are interested in this opportunity, please send me your portfolio and a brief description of your experience. I look forward to working with you to create meaningful and educational content.

Thank you!

Examples;
-Easy
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V7ADN6-U_lw&t=1255s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bukN2P7WpwE&t=432s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sac8dsPB4nk&t=2108s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F6mkyo0u5Xk

-intermedium
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hTFGb-Ce96U

https://youtu.be/kxxhO92X8ro?si=iFlsrD1xjwLy4sdZ

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zdcth9NndEA&t=260s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZYxdhMAF4F0

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SarlTxrAbIY&t=89s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tBgNpc39FJk&list=PLgcAzyvSIsn3Bm_lxmo1k16NmlMTtUc2O








Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:01 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Argentina
click to apply

item.title: Skilled Video Editor Passionate about KDramas/Asian Dramas/Films - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a full time video editor who can create videos for us in the style of:
https://www.youtube.com/@miss-k-drama/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@MyDramaListOfficial/shorts

This can be full time position if you meet video quality we are looking for and respect the deadlines.

If you are passionate about video editing and have love for Korean and Asian dramas, we would love to hear from you.

We would do 2 shorts a day (5$ a shorts that are between 10-20sec long) and if you're quality are good we can talk about long form videos too :)

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Video, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Video, Video Editing

item.title: Seeking Media Buyers, Social Media Managers, and Content Creators/Video Editors for Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: (READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION)

We are currently embarking on the launch of a new agency and are actively seeking candidates for the positions of media buyers(facebook & google ads), social media managers, and content creators/video editors to join our esteemed team. As a valued member of our agency, you will have the exceptional opportunity to contribute to stimulating projects on behalf of a diverse range of clients. We offer highly competitive compensation packages and the potential for enduring professional partnerships. If you possess expertise in any of the aforementioned areas and possess an unwavering passion for the creation of captivating content, we eagerly anticipate receiving your application.

WHEN YOU APPLY TO THIS JOB SEND OUT A VIMEO VIDEO ABOUT YOU AND YOUR CASE STUDIES AND WE'LL DETERMINE WHO TO GO FORWARD WITH!!!!

Required Qualifications: (IF YOU ONLY HANDLE JUST 2 OF THESE EXPERTISE YOU CAN STILL SUBMIT A PROPOSAL)

- Proficiency in media buying/digital marketing
- Proficiency in social media management
- Proficiency in content creation
- Proficiency in video editing

Join us as we cultivate an exceptional team of dynamic and talented individuals that consistently delivers unparalleled services to our esteemed clientele.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 09:57 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Content Writing, Facebook, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Copywriting
Skills: TikTok, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Content Writing, Facebook, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Copywriting
Country: Finland
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Edits for Reels and Tiktok - Upwork
item.description:
RESPOND WITH A PRODUCED SAMPLE VIDEO, READ MESSAGE FOR CLARIFICATION.

Hello,

I am in need of a short form Video Editor, who is also good in music/audio editing, who can recreate this video exactly: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7R3iH3Cxbw/?igsh=MW9yZjM1ZHV3cXRrZQ==

Only respond to my job post with this video exactly and precisely recreated.

The clips are from a movie called: The Green Knight

When your quality is good enough, we will continue our journey together with a price point of 50usd per such video, 30 videos per month.

Kind regards,

Yordi

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 30, 2024 09:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing

item.title: Skilled Thumbnail Designer YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
Searching for a skilled thumbnail artist with a fast turnaround time.

Thumbnails will be for a spirituality channel, check the attached thumbnails.  

* Fast turnaround time max 24-36 hours
* Understanding of thumbnail psychology in videos
* Takes inspiration from competitors

I need multiple thumbnails at the same time, and willing to pay 15$ per thumbnail.
If you are interested, send me your relevant samples to higher your chances of getting hired.
